text:
Good morning, Producer.
It's a truly pleasant morning, isn't it?

Ah, good morning, Sakuya.
...What's up? Did something good happen?

!
Hehe, you always seem to see through everything.

Lately, more than ever before──...
every day feels fulfilling.

That's great!
It must be because──...

Hehe, yeah...
I'm able to spend stimulating days with my precious friends.

To live up to everyone's expectations,
we'll need to work even harder for our debut live.

I see...!
As dependable as ever, Sakuya.

...I understand. Hehe.
Alright... I'll accept that invitation.

You always strive forward with such positivity...
I'm grateful for that.

Oh... well, that's only natural.
"Everyone" includes you too, of course.

Haha, but don't push yourself too hard, okay?
Let's work hard together with "everyone"!
